title: 103. Navigating the Skins of the Earth with Raoul Bunschoten
itunes:title: 103. Navigating the Skins of the Earth with Raoul Bunschoten
description: How might we navigate and negotiate the skins of the Earth in the face of climate change? What can Byzantine architecture and Plato’s Khôra teach us about urban living in the 21st Century? What is the role of the architect in current cultural production? This week, we have a fascinating conversation with Raoul Bunschoten, Professor of Sustainable Urban Planning and Urban Design at the TU Berlin, and founder of Chora an architectural design and urban planning group.
